name: tm34
effect: Teaches Shock Wave to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Sludge Wave to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Shock Wave Gen II: Swagger Gen I: Bide)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those hit.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those hit.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.
